revised_title: Microsporangia of Pteridosperme and Their Relationship to Existing Groups
tldr: The author examines the microsporangia of pteridosperms and their relationship to existing groups. They conclude that Sphenopteris Honinghausi and Lyginodendron Oldhamium share identical characteristics, such as stems with net-like meshes and spine-like outgrowths on stems, petioles, and pinnules, confirming their close relationship.
